twoSetSkill.name: Royal Guard 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: For every friendly summoned entity, the host gains 12% Total DMG Multiplier for 10.0s. Stacks up to 3 times. Triggering this again at max stacks resets the duration of the stack with the least remaining time.

threeSetSkill.name: Energy Reflow 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Gain 50% Crit DMG. Under Herrscher Form, gain 15% Crit Rate.
